description: This is a nice easy trail for any beginner.  There are a few hills and valleys that may be a bit more challenging in the winter, however, for spring, summer and especially fall it's definitely relaxing and enjoyable.
directions: Take Hwy 5 to exit Des Hautes Plaines, turn left and drive for 600m (the road comes to a "T") then turn left on Cite Des Jeunes for 100m and park on Rue Du Plein Air (N45 28.283 W75 46.815).  The trail is directly across the street on Cite Des Jeunes.
title: Gatineau Park Tr. 1 (Cite Des Jeunes) - Gatineau Park
